hopobject.name: EECCD
hopobject.pname: Electrical Energy computation and Cost Dissipation
hopobject.body: The Master control Unit (MCU) communicates with each Subscriber unit (S) having a physical address in different localities also possessing respective physical address and stores the count of units in a memory. This MCU is then physically connected to a PC based server which is prepared to pass on an electronic statement of charges to the respective clients (C) which are present on a local network which is connected to internet and make a transaction of amount after they receive an acknowledgement from the client.
hopobject.shortdesc: EECCD system makes use of wireless networking for computation of number of units representing energy consumed by the customer and sends an electronic statement of charges via local network and after an acknowledgement from the customer will make necessary transaction of amount from the bank account via online banking.
